title: Wrong data set result returned when set an invalid filter expression for row[0]
description: When a filter is set using the expression 'row[0] equals to 0', the result set is either incorrect or null.
OB: The first result record is returned when previewing the data set after setting a filter with the expression 'row[0] equals to '.
EB: As mentioned by the developer, 'row[0]' can only be generated after all the data is fetched and cannot be used as a filter expression.
SR:
1. Open the data set and set a filter using the expression 'row[0] equals to '
2. Click on the Preview tab
